name: Push On 7DRL
description:
Topdown 2d roguelike made for 7DRL.

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move.

- Space to skip turn.

The rules are as follows:

- Your goal is to get to the opposite corner of the map.

- You cannot travel through lava.

- Enemies can travel through lava.

- You can push enemies into lava to kill them (this makes no sense since they can travel through it, but dems da rulez)

- Enemies can push you into lava and that kills you starting the game over from the beginning.

- Each successive level has more enemies.

See how far you can get before the game bugs out or you die! But you'll have to remember what level you're on because the game does not keep track!
